title: Black screen on client after spectating a game that just started.
body:
If you spectate a friend's game just after they have finished champ select (during the 3 minute loading/spectate delay), the client is dark except for the chat options along the bottom.

There is no option to exit from spectating, and you are forced to wait until the spectate delay ends and the spectate client starts up.

Pls fix?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?

Let me know if this helps, otherwise we can explore further potential issues.

Just ran the client repair.

From what I gather, it works as normal on the first spectate when you run the client...

http://i.imgur.com/3TLZWgg.jpg

and subsequent spectates start exhibiting the problem

http://i.imgur.com/TlsQMoO.png

(only if the game needs to wait for that 3-min-spectate-delay of course, if the game is well underway then the spectate client loads up)

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5).

If the issue still occurs, try pressing your enter (return) key a few times, some users have reported this helps when such an issue happens in champ select.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=lgOzjhKH,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-07T00:41:54.341+0000)
>
> Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5).
> 
> If the issue still occurs, try pressing your enter (return) key a few times, some users have reported this helps when such an issue happens in champ select.

Both are a no-go.

Once again, first spectate on a freshly opened client allowed the spectate screen to be shown (as above, 1st pic). Subsequent spectates show black screens upon spectating while waiting for the spectate delay.

_Used 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4 as DNS servers_

Enter/Return also did nothing.

Definitely sounds odd, I'm unable to confirm/deny this as a bug right now, but if you wish to post a bug report please do so on the [Report a Bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), before reporting a bug be sure to read the [How to Report a Game Bug thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug).
